title: Madcap: The Half-Life of Syd Barrett, Pink Floyd's Lost Genius
description: Beautiful, charismatic, and talented, in 1966 Syd Barrett invented the British Psychedelic scene—founding Pink Floyd—before collapsing into madness two years later. This book traces the history of rock's lost genius, through exclusive access to those closest to Syd throughout his life.
author: Tim Willis
